price: Her kim, Allah'a ve Peygamberine itaat eder ve O'ndan korkup sakınırsa, işte kurtuluşa erenler de bunlardır.
arabic: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخۡشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu wayakhsha al-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
